2010-11-29-what-are-the-fundamental-thin.title: What are the fundamental things about JavaScript that you wish you had known when you first started as a developer

meta.description: Answering a question from Pippa Bachanan. I wish I knew more about where the JavaScript APIs came from and how they relate to one another.
